sect3.title: Network Monitor
sect3.para:
The network monitor has been improved and now has support for wireless interfaces, showing signal strength in the properties and on the panel.
Network Monitor
The Network Monitor panel applet.

sect3.title: Battery Support
sect3.para: The battery monitor has been improved dramatically. The applet now gives an estimation of the time remaining as well as the remaining battery capacity. In addition to this, the dialog to warn you of low battery power is now more visible, more informative and vanishes automatically when your laptop in.

sect3.title: Weather Alerts
sect3.para: The weather applet now has more locations then ever before. As well as support for the new United Kingdom weather forecasts.

sect3.title: Calendar Integration
sect3.para: Never miss another appointment. The calendar view, available by clicking on the clock now connects to Evolution to get your calendar and tasks.
